summary: A command‑line utility that converts original PromptDiffusion and related Stable Diffusion checkpoint files—especially those containing only a ControlNet—into the HuggingFace Diffusers format. It provides low‑level helpers for copying model layers, rebuilding configuration objects, creating schedulers, and optionally downloading source checkpoints, so the converted components can be loaded with Diffusers pipelines.
business_intent: Allow researchers and developers to migrate proprietary PromptDiffusion/ControlNet checkpoint files into the standardized Diffusers ecosystem, enabling easier integration, deployment, and use of these models in image‑generation applications.
